pacman.model

类 ThePacman

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.Circle
          • pacman.model.ThePacman
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class ThePacman
extends javafx.scene.shape.Circle
    This class defines a pacman as the leading actor of the game.

    Animation of the pacman can be created by ThePacman.createAnimation method, including moving up, left, down, right. The pacman can interact with other game items, including ghosts, cookie, super cookie, portal and level entry. During the animation of the pacman, it will check whether it touches any game item. If any game item is touched, corresponding changes will happen. If the pacman touches a ghost, it will lose life. If the pacman touches a cookie, it will get score bonus. If the cookie is a super cookie, the pacman will get speed bonus additionally. If the pacman touches a portal, it will be teleported to another portal. If the pacman touches the level entry in infinite mode, it will enter next level.

    作者:
    Zhangli Wang
    另请参阅:
    GameModel

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ThePacman

        public ThePacman(double x,
                 double y,
                 GameModel gameModel)
        Initialize the pacman with a position by the parameter x and y.
        参数:
        x - - index of x
        y - - index of y
        gameModel - - the game board

    • 方法详细资料

      • createAnimation

        public javafx.animation.AnimationTimer createAnimation(java.lang.String direction)
        Creates an animation of the pacman with a given direction.

        The animation is moving towards the direction, image of the pacman will rotate accordingly. The animation checks any coalition in each step.

        参数:
        direction - - direction of the movement
        返回:
        the animation

      • checkCookieCoalition

        public void checkCookieCoalition(java.lang.String axis,
                                 java.util.List<Cookie> cookieSet)
        Checks if the pacman touches cookies. If a visible cookie is touched, the pacman can get score bonus and GameManager.scoreBoard will be updated. If the cookie is a super cookie by judging cookie instanceof SuperCookie, the pacman can get speed bonus additionally. Afterwards the cookie will be hidden by Cookie.hide method. In not infinite mode, if all cookies on the game board are eaten, GameManager.endGame method will be called. In infinite mode, if all cookies on the game board are eaten, GameManager.clearLevel method will be called.
        参数:
        axis - - axis of direction of the movement
        cookieSet - all cookies in the game board

      • checkGhostCoalition

        public void checkGhostCoalition(java.util.Set<Ghost> ghosts)
        Checks if the pacman is touching a ghost. If the pacman touches a ghost, GameManager.lifeLost method will be called.
        参数:
        ghosts - all ghosts in the game board

      • checkPortalCoalition

        public void checkPortalCoalition(DoublePortals portals)
        Checks if pacman is touching a portal. If the pacman touches a portal, its x coordinate will be set to the position of another portal.
        参数:
        portals - the two portals on the game board.

      • checkLevelEntryCoalition

        public void checkLevelEntryCoalition(LevelEntry levelEntry)
        Checks if the pacman is touching a level entry. If the pacman touches a level entry, GameManager.enterNextLevel method will be called.
        参数:
        levelEntry - the level entry
